LanguageData.Anty_prototype.label: proty
LanguageData.Anty_prototype.description:
An ancestor of Anties in earlier stage of the project. Unlike the Anties, they are closer to ants than human, which lacks intelligence to recieve delicate commands.

By the time the Anties escaped from the lab, they were drawn to the Hive by pheromones. This wasn't intentional but Anties are liked them, saying they were like a puppy And delicious.

Proty's average height are 95cm, human type and ant type are same.
LanguageData.Anty_prototype.tools.0.label: BigJaw
LanguageData.Anty_prototype.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.EggProty.label: Proty egg
LanguageData.EggProtyUn.label: Proty egg(unfert.)
LanguageData.Nutritional_jelly_thing.label: Nutritional jelly
LanguageData.Nutritional_jelly_thing.description: Jelly that is consumed by reproductive entities. They are referred to as jelly, but in fact, they are congelation of mutagenic substances. When consumed, Anties will develop an egg sac, disregard of the gender. Anty larvae and serious injuries cannot survive this transformation.
LanguageData.Battlestimulation_jelly_thing.label: Combat-stim jelly
LanguageData.Battlestimulation_jelly_thing.descriptio: Jelly that is consumed by combatant entities. They are referred to as jelly, but in fact, they are congelation of mutagenic substances. When consumed, Anties will experience heightened enhancements in physical abilities. Anty larvae and serious injuries cannot survive this transformation.
LanguageData.Eraser_jelly_thing.label: Eraser jelly
LanguageData.Eraser_jelly_thing.description: Jelly that is consumed to nullify the trait and return to the original state. They are referred to as jelly, but in fact, they are congelation of mutagenic substances. When consumed, Anties will lose the traits gained by other jellies. Anty larvae and serious injuries cannot survive this transformation.
LanguageData.AT_Aphidextract.label: Aphid extract
LanguageData.AT_Aphidextract.description: Aphid extract with a high concentration of nutrients. Due to the effect of nutritional jelly, it retains some of the gene modification properties.
LanguageData.AT_SporeBomb.label: Spore release
LanguageData.Anty_pheromone.label: Anty pheromone Pack
LanguageData.Anty_pheromone.description: Concentrated Anty pheromone that has been packaged with mucous membrane.
LanguageData.Antypheromone_Charge.label: Anty assault pheromone
LanguageData.Antypheromone_Charge.description: A phermone inhaler. This particular inhaler is made with phermone that is released from Antys when they charge on to their enemies. Inhalation causes chainreaction within user's body, which releases more phermone and drastically enhances close-quarters combat performance. It also affects surrounding proties.\n\n Larvae cannot tolerate the strong stimulation of pheromone inhalants.
LanguageData.Antypheromone_Shooting.label: Anty Shooting pheromone
LanguageData.Antypheromone_Shooting.description: a phermone inhaler. This particular inhaler is made with phermone that is released from Antys when they shoot firearms. Inhalation causes chainreaction within user's body, which releases more phermone and drastically enhances shooting ability.\n\n Larvae cannot tolerate the strong stimulation of pheromone inhalants.
LanguageData.Antypheromone_Suicide.label: Anty detonation phermone
LanguageData.Antypheromone_Suicide.description: An inhaler filled with phermone that hyperstimulates Anty's acidsac. Inhalation causes a powerful red-burst explosion. It also affects surrounding proties.\n\n Larvae cannot tolerate the strong stimulation of pheromone inhalants.
LanguageData.AT_SuicideBomb.label: SuicideBomb
LanguageData.AT_AP_St_A.label: Anty Shirt
LanguageData.AT_AP_St_B.label: Anty Cape Shirt
LanguageData.AT_AP_St_B.description: An outdoor attire beloved by Anties on windy days. The ribbon hides steel wire, which is convenient for garrote.
LanguageData.AT_AP_St_C.label: Anty Cape Coat
LanguageData.AT_AP_St_C.description: Apparel that Anties wear during cold winter. Vivid red is visible from anywhere.
LanguageData.AT_AP_St_D.label: Anty Jacket
LanguageData.AT_AP_St_D.description: A jacket with a mandible, the symbol of Anties, embroidered in the back. When you see a pack of Anties wearing this, you're a snack.
LanguageData.AT_AP_St_F.label: Anty Crop top
LanguageData.AT_AP_St_F.description: A piece of clothing that maximized the exposure of where it can be sweaty.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Chain_A.label: Anty Chainarmor
LanguageData.AT_AP_Chain_A.description: Early day armor used by Anties to protect their bodies. It is not as sturdy as plate armor, but it is much easier to move in.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Helm_A.label: Anty Plate Helm
LanguageData.AT_AP_Helm_A.description: An Anty's plate helm made by scrap metals.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Additionalchain_A.label: Anty Additional chainarmor
LanguageData.AT_AP_Additionalchain_A.description: An extra piece of chain armor designed to protect stomach attached behind waist.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Shooter_A.label: Anty Military uniform
LanguageData.AT_AP_Shooter_A.description: Anties' combat attire. Depending on the surrounding temperature, it either circulates the air inside to cool, or stops the circulation of air to keep the warmth.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Head_A.label: Anty Bulletproof Helmet
LanguageData.AT_AP_Head_A.description: A bulletproof helmet with camouflage paint.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Head_B.label: Anty Bulletproof Commender Helmet
LanguageData.AT_AP_Head_B.description: A bulletproof helmet designated for commanders.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Flakvest.label: Anty Flakvest
LanguageData.AT_AP_Flakvest.description: A bulletproof vest that can effectively stop the bullets. The plates used in the vest is efficient but lacks flexibility, which cost the mobility of the user.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Additionalarmorplate_A.label: Anty Additional armor plate
LanguageData.AT_AP_Additionalarmorplate_A.description: An extra piece of armorplate desigend to protect stomach attached behind waist.
LanguageData.AT_AP_SH_A.label: Anty Military uniform Cloak
LanguageData.AT_AP_SH_A.description: A camouflaged cloak worn by Anty soldiers. Although it lacks the ability to protect the user from the attacks, it protects the user from both hot and cold weather.
LanguageData.AT_AP_CO_A.label: Anty Commender Cape
LanguageData.AT_AP_CO_A.description: A Cape worn by Anty commanders to show the class distinction. It lacks the ability to protect the user, but it still provides some protection from hot and cold weather.
LanguageData.AT_AP_CO_B.label: Anty Commender Cloak
LanguageData.AT_AP_CO_B.description: A Cloak worn by Anty commanders to show the class distinction. It lacks the ability to protect the user, but it still provides some protection from hot and cold weather.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_A.label: Anty Cataglyphis armor
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_A.description: A powered armor that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.\n\nIt has a fire control system to reduce aiming time.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_Head_A.label: Anty Cataglyphis helmet
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_Head_A.description: A powered helmat that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.
LanguageData.AT_AP_AdditionalPower_A.label: Anty Cataglyphis Additional armor
LanguageData.AT_AP_AdditionalPower_A.description: A powered helmat that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_B.label: Anty Cataglyphis Commender armor
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_B.description: A powered armor that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_Head_B.label: Anty Cataglyphis Commender helmet
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_Head_B.description: A powered helmat that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.
LanguageData.AT_AP_AdditionalPower_B.label: Anty Cataglyphis Commender Additional armor
LanguageData.AT_AP_AdditionalPower_B.description: A powered helmat that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_C.label: Anty Dinoponera armor
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_C.description: A powered armor that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.\n\nAlthough it is difficult to move due to its thick armor, it can deploy a shield that absorbs all damage.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_C.verbs.0.label: pop Physical force neutralization shield
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_Head_C.label: Anty Dinoponera helmet
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_Head_C.description: A powered helmat that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.
LanguageData.AT_AP_AdditionalPower_C.label: Anty Dinoponera Additional armor
LanguageData.AT_AP_AdditionalPower_C.description: A powered helmat that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_D.label: Anty Paraponera armor
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_D.description: A powered armor that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.\n\nIt can disarm the enemy.
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_D.verbs.0.label: pop Diplomatic needle
LanguageData.AT_BulletParaponeraLauncher.label: Diplomatic needle
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_Head_D.label: Anty Paraponera helmet
LanguageData.AT_AP_Power_Head_D.description: A powered helmat that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.
LanguageData.AT_AP_AdditionalPower_D.label: Anty Paraponera Additional armor
LanguageData.AT_AP_AdditionalPower_D.description: A powered helmat that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings.
LanguageData.AT_Superregenerationdevice.label: Anty Hyper Reconstruction Device
LanguageData.AT_Superregenerationdevice.description: A deviced developed by Antys to send the injured soldiers back to the frontline.\n\nSpecialized organic tissues for accelerated healing jump from one place on the body to another, making this device unfit for medical operations.
LanguageData.AntyCopyTailoringBench.label: Copy tailor bench
LanguageData.AntyCopyTailoringBench.description: A sewing table that is built by imitating conventional sewing tables.
LanguageData.AntyCopyTableMachining.label: Copy machining table
LanguageData.AntyCopyTableMachining.description: A fabrication bench that is built by imitating conventional fabricating bench. It is not only capable of handing inorganic materials such as metals but also capable of melding and fabricating the organic-inorganic compound.
LanguageData.AntyTableButcher.label: Anty machine butcher table
LanguageData.AntyTableButcher.description: An electric butchery table invented by Anties, to efficiently handle the vast amount of corpses as a product of countless combats.
LanguageData.AntyExoskeleton_Production.label: Exoskeleton Auto Mine
LanguageData.AntyExoskeleton_Production.description: A device made to harvest exoskeleton without the inefficient sacrifice of Anties. The built-in AI core regularly creates an exoskeleton based on the Anty's DNA injected into the device.
LanguageData.At_farm.label: Refleum incubator
LanguageData.At_farm.description: A device that can incubate refleum based on the exoskeleton of Anties.
LanguageData.AT_Chart.label: Anty butcher-chart
LanguageData.AT_Chart.description: A collection of Anties drawings of other species for more efficient butchering. Although it may not be much more than doodles, it is quite helpful for Anties who spend days with literal guts.
LanguageData.LifePoweredGenerator.label: Life powered generator
LanguageData.LifePoweredGenerator.description: It is a generator that generates electricity from the extract of aphids.
LanguageData.Anty_RecycleTurret.label: Recycle turret-Outside addon
LanguageData.Anty_RecycleTurret.description: An auto-turret that is built using decommissioned or good-for-nothing lazy entities. It has proven its usefulness in many ways, such as fortifying the base and filling up the lacking firepower on the battlefield. Passerbys sometimes feel something glaring at them.\n\nFires acid grenades.
LanguageData.Bullet_RecycleTurret.label: Recycle turret bullet
LanguageData.Gun_RecycleTurret.label: Recycle turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_RecycleTurret.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Anty_RecycleTurretB.label: Recycle turret-Inside addon
LanguageData.Anty_RecycleTurretB.description: An auto-turret that is built using decommissioned or good-for-nothing lazy entities. It has proven its usefulness in many ways, such as fortifying the base and filling up the lacking firepower on the battlefield. Passerbys sometimes feel something glaring at them.\n\nFires acid/glue bullets.
LanguageData.Bullet_glueRifle.label: glue Bullet
LanguageData.Gun_RecycleTurretB.label: Recycle turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_RecycleTurretB.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Anty_RecycleTurretC.label: Recycle turret-obstruction addon
LanguageData.Anty_RecycleTurretC.description: An auto-turret that is built using decommissioned or good-for-nothing lazy entities. It has proven its usefulness in many ways, such as fortifying the base and filling up the lacking firepower on the battlefield. Passerbys sometimes feel something glaring at them.\n\nFires glue shells.
LanguageData.Gun_RecycleTurretC.label: Recycle turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_RecycleTurretC.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.AT_TP_AMM.label: Repurposed Landmine
LanguageData.AT_TP_AMM.description: A landmine with advanced mechanoid detector, which can detonate when it sense mechanoid even from a distance. It can also works like a regular landmine against other targets.\n\nIt is filled with concentrated red-burst, which makes it effective against not only mechanoids, but all types of enemies.
LanguageData.AT_Wall.label: Anti-impact wall
LanguageData.AT_Wall.description: An impassable structure, capable of supporting the roof. It distributes shock to the entire structure, allowing it to withstand strong impact such as explosions.\n\nHowever, it is not as effective against more focused force.
LanguageData.AT_WallB.label: Saliva wall
LanguageData.AT_WallB.description: n impassable structure, capable of supporting the roof. Because it is made with clay and saliva of Anties, it is very weak.
LanguageData.AntyAutodoor.label: Anti-impact door
LanguageData.AntyAutodoor.description: Door that distributes shock to the entire structure, allowing it to withstand strong impact such as explosions.\n\nHowever, it is not as effective against more focused force.
LanguageData.AT_Chunk_A.label: Exoskeleton scraps(3H)
LanguageData.AT_Chunk_A.description: A scraps of exoskeleton that is used by Anties for a pinch of extra protection. It dissolves in time.
LanguageData.AT_Barricade_A.label: Improvised Refleum barricade(3H)
LanguageData.AT_Barricade_A.description: An improvised cover developed by Anties to protect themselves from the everchanging tide of the battlefield. It dissolves in time.
LanguageData.AntyExoskeleton.label: Anty Exoskeleton
LanguageData.AntyExoskeleton.description: Exoskeletons of Anties. It is hard to touch, but the texture is similar to that of humans. The cells in the exoskeleton can enter a dormant state, which allows it to stay alive for a long period of time after being detached from the body.\n\nIt has a double structure, with a non-magnetic metal on the outside and chitin on the inside. And the metal on the outside is covered with a thin film similar to human skin.
LanguageData.Refleum.label: Refleum
LanguageData.Refleum.description: A metallic compound made based on Anty's exoskeleton. It pulsates faintly, which gave them the name 'the living metal.' If it is used without going through a special process, it will lose the properties of living beings.
LanguageData.Anty_Recyclecore.label: Recyclecore
LanguageData.Anty_Recyclecore.description: An artificial intelligence core fabricated with corpses.
LanguageData.AT_Reinforcedexoskeleton_Thing.label: Anty Reinforced exoskeleton
LanguageData.AT_Reinforcedexoskeleton_Thing.descripti: An powered exoskeleton for Antys made with Refleum. It organicly binds to the existing exoskeleton, providing excellent protection without causing any discomfortA powered exoskeleton for Antys made with Refleum. It organically binds to the existing exoskeleton, providing excellent protection without causing any discomfort.
LanguageData.AT_AcidRifle.label: Acid Rifle
LanguageData.AT_AcidRifle.description: An early type of modern weapon that shoots Anty-Acid, the acid that builds up in the body of Anties.\n\nIt does not provide reliable firepower due to its unstable nozzle and lack of propulsion power.
LanguageData.AT_AcidRifle.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.AT_AcidRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_AcidRifle.label: Acid Bullet
LanguageData.AT_AcidAssaultRifle.label: Acid Assault Rifle
LanguageData.AT_AcidAssaultRifle.description: A firearm that fires more Anty-Acid, an acid that builds up in the body of Anties, faster and further.\n\nThe nozzle stabilizer and pressure amplifier provide superior range and accuracy than the earlier version.
LanguageData.AT_AcidAssaultRifle.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.AT_AcidAssaultRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_AcidRifle_R.label: Acid Bullet
LanguageData.AT_AcidLineRifle.label: Acid Line Rifle
LanguageData.AT_AcidLineRifle.description:
A firearm that fires more Anty-Acid, an acid that builds up in the body of Anties, faster and further.

It is designed to be used behind the Melee, and in front of the ranged combatants, supporting both.

It is very effective in close range.
LanguageData.AT_AcidLineRifle.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_AcidRifle_L.label: Acid Bullet
LanguageData.AT_LMG.label: Acid Light Machine Gun
LanguageData.AT_LMG.description: A firearm that fires more Anty-Acid, an acid that builds up in the body of Anties, faster and further.\n\nIts focus on fire rate resulted in weaker shots.
LanguageData.AT_LMG.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.AT_LMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_AcidRifle_M.label: Acid Bullet
LanguageData.AT_AcidLauncher.label: Acid launcher
LanguageData.AT_AcidLauncher.description: A firearm that fires more Anty-Acid, an acid that builds up in the body of Anties, further in a larger area.\n\nEffective against heavy armored or clustered enemies.
LanguageData.AT_AcidLauncher.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.AT_AcidLauncher.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.BulletAcidLauncher.label: Acid Grenade
LanguageData.Filth_AntyAcid.label: AntyAcid
LanguageData.AT_Combatglue.label: Combat glue launcher
LanguageData.AT_Combatglue.description: A firearm used to fire Anties adhesive to protect the ranged combatants from the charging enemies. Anties are not affected by the adhesive.
LanguageData.AT_Combatglue.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.AT_Combatglue.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.BulletCombatglueLauncher.label: Combat glue Grenade
LanguageData.Filth_AntyGlue.label: Combat glue
LanguageData.Shell_AT_glueBomb.label: Combat glue shell
LanguageData.Shell_AT_glueBomb.description: A firearm used to fire Anties adhesive to protect the ranged combatants from the charging enemies. Anties are not affected by the adhesive.
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_AT_glueBomb.label: Combat glue shell
LanguageData.AT_Sickle.label: Sickle
LanguageData.AT_Sickle.description: An oversized sythe used by Anties.
LanguageData.AT_Sickle.tools.0.label: edge
LanguageData.AT_Sickle.tools.1.label: handle
LanguageData.AT_Halberd.label: Halberd
LanguageData.AT_Halberd.description: A giant axe beloved by Anty warriors. The axeblade is often used as a drawing board.
LanguageData.AT_Halberd.tools.0.label: Axe
LanguageData.AT_Halberd.tools.1.label: Spear
LanguageData.AT_Halberd.tools.2.label: Hook
LanguageData.AT_Hammer.label: Hammer
LanguageData.AT_Hammer.description: A hammer beloved by Anty warriors. When not in combat, it is used to break the heads of patients and prisoners alike.
LanguageData.AT_Hammer.tools.0.label: Hammer
LanguageData.AT_AcidCross.label: Acid Crossbow
LanguageData.AT_AcidCross.description: A ranged weapon that shoots bolts covered in Anty-Acid, the acid that builds upon a body of Anties. The Anty-Acid is applied manually before firing because it corrodes the tip otherwise.
LanguageData.AT_AcidCross.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.AT_Aicdbolt.label: Aicd Bolt
LanguageData.AT_PP_S.label: Anty X-war Gift box
LanguageData.AT_PP_S.description:
We wish you a merry warfare

We wish you a merry warfare

We wish you a merry warfare and a Painful death!

Good tidings we bring to you and your kin

We wish you a merry warfare and a Painful death!

Oh, bring us some pirate pudding

Oh, bring us some Tribal pudding

Oh, bring us some Empire pudding

And bring it right here

Good tidings we bring to you and your kin

We wish you a merry warfare and a Painful death!

We won't go until we get victory

We won't go until we get victory

We won't go until we get victory

So bring it right here

Good tidings we bring to you and your kin

We wish you a merry warfare and a Painful death...again!
LanguageData.AT_PP_S.tools.0.label: Box corner
LanguageData.Bullet_PP_A.label: Giftbox
LanguageData.BulletExecutionerChain.label: Physical force neutralization shield
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_A.label: Red-Burst Rifle
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_A.description:
Weapon developed by Anty to face against innately strong or heavily armored enemies.

 Unlike the standard acid weapons, this devastating weapon fires Redburst, the Antyacid-Refleum chemical compound.

 It is the most standard form of Redburst weapon.
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_A.tools.0.label: Nozzle
LanguageData.Bullethydroheliumion.label: Red-Burst Bullet
LanguageData.Filth_ApproachSmoke_B.label: Acid Refleum gas
LanguageData.AT_RedHalberd.label: Red-burst halberd
LanguageData.AT_RedHalberd.description: A halberd with an in-built red-burst emitter, which releases red-burst upon impact. Stabbing with the spearhead, which the emitter is directly attached, will inject large amount of red-burst to the target.\n\nIt is equipped with a powerful EMP function.
LanguageData.AT_RedHalberd.tools.0.label: Axe
LanguageData.AT_RedHalberd.tools.1.label: Spearhead
LanguageData.AT_RedHalberd.tools.2.label: Hook
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_B.label: Red-Burst Line Rifle
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_B.description:
Weapon developed by Anty to face against innately strong or heavily armored enemies.

 Unlike the standard acid weapons, this devastating weapon fires Redburst, the Antyacid-Refleum chemical compound.

 It has shorter fire range due to the unstable nozzle, thus making it more effective in situations that does not require long fire range, such as urban warfare. Also, since it has superior firepower in close range, it can be utilized even in close combat.

It is equipped with a powerful EMP function.
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_B.tools.0.label: Nozzle
LanguageData.Bullethydroheliumion_B.label: Red-Burst Bullet
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_C.label: Red-Burst Cluster
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_C.description:
Weapon developed by Anty to face against innately strong or heavily armored enemies.

 Unlike the standard acid weapons, this devastating weapon fires Redburst, the Antyacid-Refleum chemical compound.

 It causes huge explosion of redburst. It is most effective against stationed or clustered enemies.
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_C.tools.0.label: Nozzle
LanguageData.Bullethydroheliumion_C.label: Red-Burst Bullet
LanguageData.Bullethydroheliumion_C_B.label: Red-Burst Bullet
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_CombatSmoke.label: Refleum Gaspack
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_CombatSmoke.description: An equipment developed by Anty to suppress enemies' sights and movements. It sprays acidified refleum gas over a large area of the battlefield.
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_CombatSmoke.verbs.0.label: pop Refleum Gaspack
LanguageData.BulletCombatSmokeLauncher.label: Refleum gas launcher
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_pheromone_TP.label: Targeting pheromone kit
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_pheromone_TP.description: An equipment worn by Anty commanders to give orders.
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_pheromone_TP.verbs.0.label: pop Targeting pheromone
LanguageData.AT_BulletTargetingLauncher.label: Targeting Shell
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_chunk.label: Exoskeleton Chunk Cover Kit
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_chunk.description: A pile of exoskeleton used by Anty to provide protection against enemy fire. It disintegrates over time.
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_chunk.verbs.0.label: pop chunk kit
LanguageData.AT_Bulletchunk.label: chunk Shell
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_barricade.label: Quick Field Cover Kit
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_barricade.description: Improvisable field cover that was developed by Anty to protect themselves from the ever-changing battlefield. It disintegrates over time.
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_barricade.verbs.0.label: pop barricade kit
LanguageData.AT_Bulletbarricade.label: barricade Shell
LanguageData.ProtyGum.label: Proty Gum
LanguageData.ProtyGum.description: This is a food for Proties invented by the Anties when they locked up a prisoner in a room full of hungry proties and saw the proties biting them all day long.\nIt's made of fried dried Leather, and some proties trying to chew anything can be suppressed.
LanguageData.AT_Proty_spawner.label: Proty Induced Pheromone Launcher
LanguageData.AT_Proty_spawner.description:
It is a weapon that sends a signal to the Proties waiting in the underground tunnel network.



A self-destruct device is built-in for security.
LanguageData.AT_Proty_spaBulletProtyspawnerwner.label: Proty Induced Pheromone
LanguageData.AT_Proty_spawner_Tunnel.label: Proty Induced Pheromone
LanguageData.AT_Proty_spawner_Tunnel.description: It is a weapon that sends a signal to the Proties waiting in the underground tunnel network.
LanguageData.AT_Proty_spawner_Tunnel_Open.label: Proty tunnel
LanguageData.AT_Proty_spawner_Tunnel_Open.description: This is the hole where the Proties who were waiting in the underground network of tunnels came out of.
LanguageData.AntyTransitionRefleum_Thing.label: Transition Refleum
LanguageData.AntyTransitionRefleum_Thing.description: This is Refleum which obtained nutrients and only a few genes from Anty body.\n\nNow it is closer to a living organism than a metal, and if nutrients are supplied, it can be seen as a tumor mass that causes random Transition.
LanguageData.AT_ChargeBomb_Ready_Proty.label: pheromone explosion
LanguageData.AT_SuicideBomb_Ready_Proty.label: pheromone explosion
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_D.label: Refleum gas thrower
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_D.description:
It is a weapon developed by Anties to reliably support the front-line. Unlike other Red Burst weapons, it is not effective against Mechanoids.

Acid Refleum gas is not harmful to Anty, but dangerous to other races.

â€»If used by other races, the user will also take damage.
LanguageData.AT_hydroheliumion_D.tools.0.label: Nozzle
LanguageData.Bullethydroheliumion_D.label: Acid Refleum gas
LanguageData.Filth_ApproachSmoke_A.label: Acid Refleum gas
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_bunker.label: Quick T-bunker Kit
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_bunker.description: Improvisable field cover that was developed by Anty to protect themselves from the ever-changing battlefield. It disintegrates over time.
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_bunker.verbs.0.label: pop T-bunker kit
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_orbitalbombardment.label: Anty orbital support kit
LanguageData.AT_Apparel_orbitalbombardment.descriptio: It is a device that can send a signal to the Anty fleet waiting in planetary orbit to request an orbital bombardment.\n\nAll targets within range are bombarded, but buildings are not.
LanguageData.Anty_prototype_Wild.label: Wild proty
LanguageData.Anty_prototype_Wild.description:
An ancestor of Anties in earlier stage of the project. Unlike the Anties, they are closer to ants than human, which lacks intelligence to recieve delicate commands.

By the time the Anties escaped from the lab, they were drawn to the Hive by pheromones. This wasn't intentional but Anties are liked them, saying they were like a puppy And delicious.

Proty's average height are 95cm, human type and ant type are same.

They are independently evolving individuals outside the sphere of influence of Anties. It's a little smarter than the regular Proty.
LanguageData.Anty_prototype_Wild.tools.0.label: BigJaw
LanguageData.Anty_prototype_Wild.tools.1.label: head
